summary: a small retexture replacing the glass sword with a blue/silver version
descriptionHtml:
This is my first mod that i made for myself just replacing glass swords with an alternate blue version with silver hilt. Uploading it here to get some feedback on it then may attempt to do the entire glass armor set etc. Any and all criticism and comments are most welcomed. :)


Read Me:
Blue Glass Sword Mod (Replacer)
NecroGhost88

What this is:
A simple texture replacer for Glass swords which makes them blue glass instead of green with a silver/white hilt.
this is my first mod so just releasing for a bit of feedback and peoples thoughts. thanks.

Install:
to install to unpack the BGSNG88.rar file into your \"Skyrim\\Data folder\".
or unpack any where and copy the the folder \"weapons\" to your textures folder.

to uninstall just delete the \"glasssword.dds\" file located in Skyrim\\Data\\Textures\\Weapons\\Glass
author: Necroghost88
